item.title: MotionCraft: Physics-Based Zero-Shot Video Generation
item.description: MotionCraft: Physics-based zero-shot video generation creates realistic videos with complex motion dynamics by cleverly warping the noise latent space of an image diffusion model using optical flow fr…

item.title: Topological obstruction to the training of shallow ReLU neural networks
item.description: Shallow ReLU neural networks face topological training obstructions due to gradient flow confinement on disconnected quadric hypersurfaces.
